title: Supreme Court to Consider Abortion Restrictions From Mississippi
sub_head: High court will take up state appeal seeking to ban abortion after 15 weeks of pregnancy, giving justices opportunity to revisit precedents
body:
BREAKING NEWS
WASHINGTON—The Supreme Court on Monday agreed to consider the legality of a Mississippi abortion law that seeks to ban the procedure after 15 weeks of pregnancy, a case that gives the justices an opportunity to revisit the court’s precedents protecting abortion rights.
More to follow
Write to Brent Kendall at brent.kendall@wsj.com and Jess Bravin at jess.bravin+1@wsj.com
